message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at $1000000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you and my minimum price
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still looking to get the best deal for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $1050000. This is my final offer
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go above $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
